Package Server

Class ADailyDBController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.ADailyDBController
  • public abstract class ADailyDBController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class make the functionality for the server that includes a connection to the DB. The Focus of this class is on functions that deal with Daily action (occurs every X time)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private static void checkDelayDaily​(java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function check if have readerAccount in delay of return that still didnt notify the ReaderAccount happen once per delay in borrow and insert it to History table
      private static void checkIfDidntImplementReservation​(java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function check if have reader account that didnt implement his reservation in the 48 hours he had, if he didnt implement cancel his reservaion and let the next one to implmenent(if have one) and insert it to History table
      private static void checkNotifyReturnDaily​(java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function check if have reader account that suppose to return his borrow book in the next day if have somone like this , it will notify him
      private static void countQuantityOfCopyEveryMounth​(java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function insert all readerAccounts with their status to table once to month
      static void countQuantityOfCopyInCaseAddCopyOrBookToDB​(java.sql.Connection connToSQL, java.lang.Integer numOfAddedCopies)
      This function add asked copies to the Quantity of copies of current month
      private static void monthlyUpdateUserStatusHistory​(java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function insert all readerAccounts with their status to table once to month
      private static void resetUserStatusHistory​(java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function drop the table of UserStatusHistory and Restore it as empty
      static void selection​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function sorts the request in the 'msg' to the relevant function and returns the answer
      private static void sendMail​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function send mail to asked email with asked details
      static void startThreads​(java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function start the timing of threads,triggered when the server is starting
      private static void updateHistoryStatusReader​(java.sql.Connection connToSQL, int month)
      This function count reader accounts per status(Active\Freeze\Locked) and insert it to History table
